lexUnit.name: arm.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: each of the two upper limbs of the human body from the shoulder to the hand.

sentence.text: He sprinkled water over the towel and then went into a paroxysm of agony , nursing the injured arm against his chest and holding out his other hand for money .
He felt the warmth of Barbara 's arm against his cheek , and her breast pressing into his body .

She could not help but wonder what he would be doing now ; could he be wrapped in the arms of Sarah Miller , putting Eline completely out of his thoughts ?

And Daeve said , ` Heroin , it 's what your right arm 's for . "

Next to them a baby shrieks in its mother 's arms .
She held up her wrinkled arm .

To be my sword arm and my scourge , the bane of my enemies and the defender of my children . "

She was short and square , with a small head poked forward , long swinging arms and a bent-kneed running walk .
And it 's all done with flashing eyes , waving arms , tossed heads and wringing hands .
Nobody put their arms around me and said , ` Is n't this wonderful ? " "
Midnight swung his left arm with all the force and weight of his body -- a hammer-blow on the man 's right cheekbone .

One man is just taking another by the arm as he passes , and laughing in surprise .

Maggie 's sobs were becoming more natural , but she still had her arms tight round Phoebe 's neck and her head pressed against Phoebe 's breast and her voice was muffled .
She has rather long arms with slightly curved fingers , short legs and broad feet .

Even though my mom told us lot of scary stories she was always there to hold us in her arms and let us know that the story was not true and that it was we were OK .

I was confined to my room , terrorized by the most horrible threats , cruelly ill-used to break my spirit - see this stab on my shoulder and the bruises from end to end of my arms - and a gag was thrust into my mouth on the one occasion when I tried to call from the window .
